document.full_text: edwards lifesciences corp said a u.s. regulatory advisory panel will review on july 20 its application to sell a replacement heart valve that spares patients the need for open-heart surgery.
document.title: fda to review new edwards heart valve in july
lines_and_colors: edwards lifesciences corp said a u.s. regulatory advisory panel will review on july 20 its application to sell a replacement heart valve that spares patients the need for open-heart surgery.
